评论详情: The connected lace top is very soft and roomy. The dress itself is pretty and well made. The collar and zipper are sturdy. The cuffs, collar and body are spacious- good for folks with larger arms.

On the plus side it IS comfortable, but I'm not entirely wow'd by it.

I got a small. I'm 5'2 about 120 lbs. The sleeves are great. However, the corset (even when tied as tightly as possible) is still very loose and not supportive the way a corset should be. It also does not sit high nor low enough. the back of the "corset" is very stretchy fabric so it will never really be tight. The three layers of the skirt just lay straight down and don't give any shape. Even with a slip worn underneath
